metadata.title: CVE-2022-41849 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
drivers/video/fbdev/smscufx.c in the Linux kernel through 5.19.12 has arace condition and resultant use-after-free if a physically proximateattacker removes a USB device while calling open(), aka a race conditionbetween ufx_ops_open and ufx_usb_disconnect.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-41849` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-60-generic - 5.15.0-60.66
linux-image-5.15.0-60-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-60.66
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-60-generic - 5.15.0-60.66
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-60-generic-64k - 5.15.0-60.66
No subscription required
